scripts.test: npm run test:acedirect && npm run test:acedirect-kurento && npm run test:acr-cdr && npm run test:aserver && npm run test:fendesk && npm run test:managementportal && npm run test:userver
scripts.preinstall: echo 'preinstall...' && npm run copygithooks && npm i -g eslint && npm i -g gulp && npm i -g bower && npm i -g pm2 && npm i -g yarn && npm install -g jsonlint
scripts.build: npm run copygithooks && npm run build:acedirect && npm run build:acedirect-kurento && npm run build:acr-cdr && npm run build:aserver && npm run build:fendesk && npm run build:managementportal && npm run build:userver && cat dat/ad.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run clean:acedirect && npm run clean:acedirect-kurento && npm run clean:acr-cdr && npm run clean:aserver && npm run clean:fendesk && npm run clean:managementportal && npm run clean:userver
scripts.clean:logs: npm run clean:logs:acedirect && npm run clean:logs:acedirect-kurento && npm run clean:logs:acr-cdr && npm run clean:logs:aserver && npm run clean:logs:fendesk && npm run clean:logs:managementportal && npm run clean:logs:userver
scripts.lint: npm run lint:acedirect-kurento && npm run lint:acr-cdr && npm run lint:aserver && npm run lint:fendesk && npm run lint:userver
scripts.config: cd acedirect-kurento && npm run config && touch /tmp/asterisk.csr && chmod 644 /tmp/asterisk.csr
scripts.build:acedirect-kurento: cd acedirect-kurento && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run build
